tags: I know there's already a few posts on here like this
but I had to make my own
I've just seen one too many posts arguing the contrary
even if May does hate/blame Tony at first
while she's hurting and grieving and trying to process that she's never going to see her nephew again
I think she'd come around eventually
and understand that it would've happened no matter what
and that Tony's not to blame
summary: Okay, so I have this wild theory for A4, are you all ready to hear it?  Here it is: May doesn’t hate Tony for Peter going to...
body:
Okay, so I have this wild theory for A4, are you all ready to hear it? 

Here it is:

May doesn’t hate Tony for Peter going to space, or getting dusted. She’s not even the slightest bit angry or pissed at him, because none of it was his fault and she gets that. She knows her nephew, she knows how stubborn he can be, and she knows that there was no way Tony would’ve been able to stop him from getting on that space-doughnut-ship thing despite his best efforts to try. She knows, despite how much it hurts, that even if Peter had stayed on Earth, safe and on that field-trip, that it wouldn’t have made a difference, that he’d still have been taken, still have disappeared, turned to dust, just as he had done while in Space and so she doesn’t blame Tony for it, because it just wasn’t his fault; Peter would’ve gone no matter where he was, Space or Earth, but at the very least while in Space, she’s eased if only a little by the knowledge that he wasn’t alone but with someone who cares about him, just as unconditionally as she herself does.

If anything, she’s grateful for Tony Stark, because along with everything else she knows about his ‘involvement’ in Peter’s ‘death’, she also knows that he’s going to be the one to bring her nephew back to her, safe and alive.

summary: Ironstrange ❤️ They were both geniuses in there fields, both men who Loved science and let their gifts be what led their lives...
caption:
Ironstrange ❤️ They were both geniuses in there fields, both men who Loved science and let their gifts be what led their lives until the point they couldn’t do so any longer.

Stephens incident stopped him because his hands shook to much to continue his line of work as a surgeon.
Tony’s incident stopped him continuing his work with weaponary because the facts had been thrown in his face and used against him and he realised he wanted to change what he had been doing.

Both men loved the use of their hands, Tony was always working tinkering, always something in his hands to keep him distracted. Stephen had and always will work with his hands the focus becoming easy to him after the many years of surgery and now practicing his arts, its a calming connection

Both were flirts in their own rights, but one of these never seemed to realise that fthe flirting was meant for him and the other genius would smile as he realises the issue and give a gentle “I’m in love with an idiot.” as he throws caution to the wind kissing the other for the first time.

summary: There is a monster under the bed (and he’s not even the worst one)
title: There is a monster under the bed (and he’s not even the worst one)
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MMkJon

by olivemartini

She watches him die.
Pepper can see it all the time, awake and dreaming, flashing behind her eyelids every time she dares to close them, the way the arc reactor had flickered and died and threatened to not come back to life, how she thought the great Tony Stark had met his match once and for all.
The worst part is that it would have been her fault.
She’s the one who blew up the arc reactor, after all.

Words: 1338, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 30 of All The Lovely Ones Have Scars

  • Fandoms: Iron Man (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Relationships: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Iron Man 1, Angst, Canon, Pre-Relationship, Pepper Worries, PTSD, Tony has bad dreams, they’re just trying to make it better

summary:
Tony Stark

I've lost my family again and again. First my mom, then the avengers, then Peter, I can't keep them safe and I can't...
caption:
Tony Stark

I’ve lost my family again and again. First my mom, then the avengers, then Peter, I can’t keep them safe and I can’t keep them with me.

I’m not the hero I tried to be, they deserve someone better.
My Dad was right

reblog.comment:
Tony Stark

I’ve lost my family again and again. First my mom, then the avengers, then Peter, I can’t keep them safe and I can’t keep them with me.

I’m not the hero I tried to be, they deserve someone better.

tags: inspired by a real life event
inspired by something my friend did
summary: Tony: Pepper, I have to ask you something. It’s really important. Pepper: What is it? Tony: I know you may not be ready for that...
body:
Tony: Pepper, I have to ask you something. It’s really important.

Pepper: What is it?

Tony: I know you may not be ready for that kind of commitment, but..

Pepper: What?!

Tony: Would you… play Minecraft with me?

Pepper: …

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: By Order of The King
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2vJazhE

by darkemrys

After Thanos was defeated and Earth was saved, Steve planned for him and Bucky to live the perfect that he always dreamed of. His plan is quickly thrown into jeopardy when Bucky decides to stay in Wakanda and promises to return to America when he is ready.

After six months pass without having Bucky by his side, Steve decided that he was done
waiting. He was going to Wakanda and he was going to bring Bucky home under any means necessary.

When his actions cause an international incident, Steve learns the hard way the meaning of the word “consequence” from a person that he once called a friend.

Words: 863, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe, Guardians of the Galaxy (Movies), Black Panther (2018), Doctor Strange (2016), Thor (Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Marvel (Comics)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes, Tony Stark, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Sam Wilson, Scott Lang, Clint Barton, Wanda Maximoff, Bruce Banner, Natasha Romanov, Vision, Nick Fury, Maria Hill, T’Challa, Everett Ross, Laura Barton, Other Character Tags to Be Added

summary:
Stephen: No matter how shallow and self-absorbed you pretend to be-
Tony: Excuse me, there’s no pretense here. I happen to be...
body:
Stephen: No matter how shallow and self-absorbed you pretend to be-

Tony: Excuse me, there’s no pretense here. I happen to be genuinely self-absorbed and deeply shallow.

–

Me, Peter, Rhodey, Pepper, Happy, along with other Avengers, slaps forehead: Goddamnit, Tony.

reblog.comment:
Stephen: No matter how shallow and self-absorbed you pretend to be-

Tony: Excuse me, there’s no pretense here. I happen to be genuinely self-absorbed and deeply shallow.

trail.content:
Stephen: No matter how shallow and self-absorbed you pretend to be-

Tony: Excuse me, there’s no pretense here. I happen to be genuinely self-absorbed and deeply shallow.

–

Me, Peter, Rhodey, Pepper, Happy, along with other Avengers, slaps forehead: Goddamnit, Tony.

tags: wong and rhodey are so done with their white boys
summary:
Tony: Wong, please tell Stephen that he’s an idiot, but that I still love him.
Wong: Tell him yourself.
Tony: We’re...
body:
Tony: Wong, please tell Stephen that he’s an idiot, but that I still love him.
Wong: Tell him yourself.
Tony: We’re fighting.
Wong: [puzzled] You’re sitting on his lap??
Tony: Irrelevant.

dialogue.name: Tony
dialogue.label: Tony:
dialogue.phrase: Wong, please tell Stephen that he’s an idiot, but that I still love him.
